game_description: -Compete to earn the highest score in Bowling, Basketball, Alien Shoot, whack a mole, skee ball, button wall. -Decide how long you want to play bowling -Choose the difficulty in alien shoot, whack a mole and button wall. -Score extra points with yellow balls in Basketball and skeeball. -English and spanish language support
review_1: One of the funniest games ever
review_2: I like the idea of this game. I just think that the graphics need to be improved to make it more realistic and I found it difficult to play skee ball and basketball although it was fun trying.
review_3: This can be a fun app but need adjustments and update. Both skeeball and basketball very difficult to play well in the current version. Please update. For skeeball the front glass panel should be adjusted or removed as it interferes with the proper ball roll.
